entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local smoke. Low 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Local smoke. High 26. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Becoming clear overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Local smoke. Low 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 11 May 2023
